name: Vikram Shah
summary_blurb: Vikram Shah is an experienced investment analyst with a strong focus on the technology sector. He has a proven track record in fundamental research and financial modeling, having worked with notable firms such as Goldman Sachs and J.P. Morgan. His expertise includes sourcing investment ideas and developing tactical trading strategies.
education_highlight: B.S. in Business Administration from Northwestern University - Kellogg School of Management
